description: News and reaction to the impact of coronavirus on Jersey and other top stories.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey updates and other news 1-4 September
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey updates and other news 1-4 September - BBC News
maintext:
Millbrook Playing Field, a series of fields at Five Oaks and St Andrews Park have all been removed from the shortlist of sites for Jersey's new hospital.
It leaves just the People's Park and Overdale as potential homes for the multimillion-pound project.
Sadie Le Sueur Rennard, the Constable of St Saviour, has welcomed removal of the Five Oaks site.
But she's questioning the validity of keeping the People¡¯s Park site on the list, after the States agreed last year it would not be considered as a potential site.
Ministers will announce their preferred site later this year.
